TopicTitle: How to add the [#] button to a part's context menu?

Articles.Content:
I've written a mod where it uses a min/max slider and the slider shows and functions just fine, but the part is missing the [#] button in the upper right corner of the part's menu, which I liked having around because I could plug numbers directly in.

how do I enable such a button?

On 10/15/2019 at 1:35 AM, Xyphos said:

I've written a mod where it uses a min/max slider and the slider shows and functions just fine, but the part is missing the [#] button in the upper right corner of the part's menu, which I liked having around because I could plug numbers directly in.

how do I enable such a button?

How have you defined the KSPField in your PartModule?

On 10/26/2019 at 3:31 AM, JPLRepo said:

How have you defined the KSPField in your PartModule?

https://github.com/Xyphos/KSP_AutomaticFuelCells/blob/master/AutomaticFuelCell.cs#L125-L149
I've noticed ODFC has the same issue, and the KSPFields are (as far as I can tell) fully defined. Orum did a great job on the base code.
